plot helpers¶

Helper plotting functions.

pad.plot.helpers.check_pdf_arg(pdf)[source]¶

Function to check the type of the input and return an object of type PdfPages if a str is passed.

Parameters

pdf (None or str or PdfPages) – Arg to check. If a str is passed then checks are performed that the parent directory exists and the filen is a .pdf file. If these checks pass then a PdfPages() object using the passed pdf arg is returned. If None is passed, None is returned. If a PdfPages object is passed, it is simply returned back.

Returns

pdf – Object of PdfPages type that can be used to add figures to. Or None if None is passed.

Return type

None or PdfPages
